text:
*Access our microscopy facility for free!*

We only serve external users at our facility (Octopus, near Oxford, UK), and so we are highly streamlined for this process and access is *free* inside the UK (lab time, travel, food/drink, accommodation). We are an advanced fluorescence microscopy facility, with some volume EM as well, we try to augment other core facilities by only accepting proposals that justify why they can't do their science near to their home institution.

<https://www.clf.stfc.ac.uk/Pages/Access-to-Octopus-and-Ultra.aspx>

Even if it isn't to use the Leica SP8 DLS or 3i Cleared Tissue Lightsheet that I operate, consider the other techniques we offer that might be of interest to you.

Applications are only 1-2 pages of A4 for 1-4 weeks of access from Jan-July 2025. You use the microscope the entire time, with 1-2 dedicated members of staff working with you before, during and afterwards.

Even if you aren't interested, please point other people our way, we only get applications by advertising ourselves like this, we want to help academics do microscopy and do it well.
